name: B.F. Sword
description: 10 Attack damage.

name: Chain Vest
description: 20 Armor.

name: Giant's Belt
description: 150 Health.

name: Needlessly Large Rod
description: 10 Ability power.

name: Negatron Cloak
description: 20 Magic resist.

name: Recurve Bow
description: 10% Attack speed.

name: Sparring Gloves
description: 5% Crit

name: Spatula
description: It must do something...

name: Tear of the Goddess
description: 15 Mana.

name: Assassin Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Assassin trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Dawnbringer Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Dawnbringer trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Ironclad Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Ironclad trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Legionnaire Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Legionnaire trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Redeemed Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Redeemed trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Renewer Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Renewer trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Skirmisher Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Skirmisher trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Spellweaver Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Spellweaver trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Archangel's Staff
description: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain Ability Power equal to 45% of their maximum Mana.

name: Bloodthirster
description:
Basic attacks heal the wearer for 33% of the damage dealt.

Upon falling below 40% Health, the wearer gain a 30% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

name: Blue Buff
description:
After casting their Ability, the holder gains 20 mana.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Bramble Vest
description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 80/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

name: Chalice of Power
description: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 30 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

name: Deathblade
description:
Contributing to a kill grants the holder +10 additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4).

name: Dragon's Claw
description: Grants 250 bonus Magic Resist (including components).

name: Force of Nature
description: Wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.

name: Frozen Heart
description:
Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 Hexes by 25%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
description: The holder gains 18 Armor and 18 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

name: Giant Slayer
description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 10% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1650 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 75%.

name: Guardian Angel
description:
Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description:
Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

name: Hand of Justice
description:
At the begining of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following:

• +45 Attack Damage and +45 Ability Power.

• Attacks and Abilities heal for 40% of damage dealt.

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 300 damage.

name: Infinity Edge
description:
Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Ionic Spark
description: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains +40% bonus critical strike damage.

name: Last Whisper
description:
When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300/350/400 ★ damage for 8 seconds.

name: Morellonomicon
description:
When the holder deals magic damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Quicksilver
description:
The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first 12 seconds of combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: Grants 70 bonus Ability Power (including components).

name: Rapid Firecannon
description:
Increases the wearer's Attack Range by 1 hex and grants 20% bonus Attack Speed.

The wearer's Basic Attacks can no longer miss.

name: Redemption
description:
Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 1 Hex, healing them for 20% of their missing Health.

Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks for 5 seconds.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critical strike.

name: Shroud of Stillness
description:
When combat begins, the wearer shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 35% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Spear of Shojin
description: The wearer's Basic Attacks restore 8 additional Mana.

name: Statikk Shiv
description: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

name: Sunfire Cape
description:
Every 2.5 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum health over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Thief's Gloves
description:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equip 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

[Consumes Three item Slots. Cannot Grant Shadow Items]

name: Titan's Resolve
description:
When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain 3 Attack Damage and Spell Power.

This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Trap Claw
description:
Blocks the first enemy Ability that hits the holder, and stuns the Ability's caster for 4 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Warmog's Armor
description: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

name: Zeke's Herald
description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Zephyr
description:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Zz'Rot Portal
description:
At the start of combat, the wearer taunts enemies within 2 hexes.

When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies.

name: Shadow Sword
description: 10 Attack damage.

name: Shadow Vest
description: 20 Armor.

name: Shadow Belt
description: 150 Health.

name: Shadow Rod
description: 10 Ability power.

name: Shadow Cloak
description: 20 Magic resist.

name: Shadow Bow
description: 10% Attack speed.

name: Shadow Gloves
description: 5% Crit

name: Shadow Spatula
description: It must do something...

name: Shadow Tear
description: 15 Mana.

name: Abomination Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Abomination trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Cavalier Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Cavalier trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Coven Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Coven trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Dragonslayer Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Dragonslayer trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Forgotten Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Forgotten trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Hellion Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Hellion trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Nightbringer Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Nightbringer trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Revenant Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Revenant trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Archdemon's Staff
description: Each time the holder casts their ability, they gain empty maximum Health equal to 350% of their maximum Mana. The holder then heals for that amount.

name: Riskthirster
description: Physical damage heals the holder for 40% of the damage dealt. Each time the holder heals to 90% Health, they gain 30% Attack Speed for 4 seconds (does not stack). The holder takes 25% of their maximum Health in true damage at the beginning of combat.

name: Very Dark Blue Buff
description:
After casting their Ability, the holder gains 15 Mana. If the holder has less than 60% Health, this is increased to 50.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Refracted Bramble Vest
description: Grants 200 bonus Armor (including components).

name: Chalice of Malice
description: When combat begins, all of the holder's allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 40 Ability Power for the rest of combat. The holder loses 20 Ability Power instead of gaining any.

name: Caustic Deathblade
description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder +15 Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4). The holder receives -20% maximum Health.

name: Refracted Dragon's Claw
description: Reduces incoming magic damage by 15%. Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits.

name: Force of Darkness
description: The holder's team gains +2 maximum team size, but the player's Little Legend takes +100% damage after losing a battle.

name: Frozen Dark Heart
description:
Reduces the Attack Speed of all enemies within 2 hexes by 35%. The Attack Speed of allies (except the wearer) within 1 hex is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate Of Immortality
description: The holder heals themself for 45 health every 2 seconds for each unit targeting them.

name: Evil Giantslayer
description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 50% bonus damage. If the target has less than 1100 maximum Health, the holder's Abilities and attacks do 0% decreased damage instead.

name: Fallen Guardian Angel
description:
Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 70% Health and shed all negative effects. After this effect triggers, the holder's Attack Speed is reduced by 50% for the rest of combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Guinsoo's Sacrificial Rageblade
description: Attacks grant +9% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. The bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times. The holder is dealt 2.5% of their maximum Health as true damage each attack.

name: Hand of Vengeance
description:
At the beginning of combat, the holder gains both of the following:

• +40 Attack Damage and +40 Ability Power.

• Attacks and Abilities heal for 40% of damage dealt.

These bonuses expire after each takedown, and renew on the next.

name: Hextech Gunblade Of Immortality
description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heals the ally with the lowest percent Health for 60% of the damage dealt. This heal cannot affect the holder.

name: Sacrificial Infinity Edge
description:
Grants +75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage. The holder also gains 30% Critical Strike Damage. Each time the holder attacks or casts their Ability, they take true damage equal to 3% of their max Health.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Ionic Dark-Spark
description: Enemies and allies (except the holder) within 2 hexes are zapped when they cast an ability, taking magic damage scaling with their maximum Mana. Enemies take 200% of their maximum Mana, and allies take 50% of their maximum Mana. Whenever an ally or enemy is zapped, the holder gains 10 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

name: Sacrificial Gauntlet
description: The holder gains 40% Critical Strike Damage, and magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The first time the holder casts their Ability each combat, they gain an additional 20% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat (this bonus is also applied to the first Ability cast). Each time the holder casts their Ability, they deal 100% of their maximum Mana multiplied by Star Level to themselves as true damage.

name: Final Whisper
description: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor and Magic Resist are reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. The holder's Armor and Magic Resist are also permanently reduced by 25%.

name: Locket of the Silver Lunari
shadow_name: S Locket of the Iron Solari
description: When combat begins, the holder and all allies with 2 hexes in the same row gain 60 bonus Armor and Magic Resist, but gain 5 less Mana per attack.

name: Mor-evil-lonomicon
description:
When the holder deals magic damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 100% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 25 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

The holder's ability deals 50% less damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Caustic Quicksilver
description:
The wearer is immune to crowd control for the entirety of combat and receives -20% maximum Health.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Rabadon's Caustic Deathcap
description: Grants 100 bonus Ability Power (including components) and -20% maximum Health.

name: Rapid Deathcannon
description:
Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex. Additionally, the holder gains +40% bonus Attack Speed when there are no enemies within 2 hex.

The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

name: Sacrificial Redemption
description: The holder radiates an aura to all allies on the board except themself, and heals them for 25% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. Each time this happens, the holder damages themselves for 5% of their current Health as true damage.

name: Runaan's Untamed Hurricane
description: The holder's attacks fire bolts at 2 nearby enemies, dealing 50% of the holder's Attack Damage. These bolts can critically strike but do not apply on-hit effects.

name: Dark Shroud of Stillness
description:
When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead and behind that delays affected enemies' and allies' first ability cast, increasing their maximum Mana by 65% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Spectral Spear of Shojin
description: The wearer's attacks restore 14 additional Mana. The wearer deals 15% less damage.

name: Statikk Stiletto
description:
Every other attack from the holder unleashes chain lightning that strikes 4 enemy, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

The holder receives -33% Attack Damage.

name: Eclipse Cape
description:
Every 1.5 second(s), a random enemy within 3 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum Health over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%. The holder is also burned for 2.5% of their maximum Health every second for first 8 seconds of combat, and any healing they received is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Trickster's Glove
description:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. These Items are always full shadow items.

[Consumes Three Item Slots]

name: Titan's Revenge
description: Every 3 seconds, the holder's next attack deals 20% of the total damage they have taken since the last empowered attack as true damage.

name: Vengeful Trap Claw
description:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Warmog's Sacrificial Armor
description: Grants 1800 bonus Health (including components), The holder takes 60 true damage each second.

name: Zeke's Bleak Herald
description: When combat begins, the holder reduces the Attack Speed of all allies within 1 hexes in the same row by -20% Attack Speed. The holder then gains +40% Attack Speed for each affected ally.

name: Turbulent Zephyr
description:
When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 8 seconds. Once the enemy returns to combat, they gain 30 Attack Damage and Ability Power for the rest of combat. Ignores CC immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

name: Unstable Zz'Rot Portal
description:
At the start of combat, the wearer taunts enemies within 2 hexes.

When the holder dies, a Construct with 500 Health arises and taunts enemies again. When it dies it deals 500 true damage to enemies within 1 hex(es).
